attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law to ensure that local police authorities are obliged to enforce the law which requires foreign vehicles arriving into this country to be re-registered, allocated a UK VRN and road taxed within 6 months of their arrival.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a large number of polish registered vehicles I see in the town where I live which continue to show polish registration plates and are not displaying a car road tax disc after more than a year of continuous use in the area.  How can this be when in other countries, including EU countries, road vehicles which are not re-registered locally within the time limit are confiscated without compensation?  UK - the laughing stock of the planet yet again!
